sentences.sContent: the understated elegance of the Hotel Traiano
sentences.sCn: 特拉亚诺酒店低调的优雅

synos.tran: 低调的；朴素的；轻描淡写的；不夸张的

words.tran: 保守的陈述；不充分的陈述；有保留的陈述
保守地说；有意轻描淡写
少说，少报；保守地说；有意轻描淡写

trans.tranCn: 轻描淡写的， 低调的
trans.tranOther: an understated style is one that is attractive because it is simple and does not have too many decorations
